roles.selection.title: How to pick roles
roles.selection.description.usingCommand: You can select roles using the {command} command, which opens a browseable role selection menu.
roles.selection.description.runAnywhere: This command can be run anywhere on the server.
roles.selection.description.pressButton: Alternatively, you can press the button below to open the menu here.
roles.noCategory.name: No category selected
roles.noCategory.description: Select a role category to get a list of the available roles.
roles.language.name: Language
roles.language.categories.proficiency.de: Roles representing the user's language proficiency and knowledge of the language.
roles.language.categories.proficiency.ro: I am just beginning to learn; I have limited understanding and I know a couple basic phrases.
I have been learning for a while; I have decent understanding and I can sustain a conversation.
I have been learning for a long time; I have firm understanding and I can speak without much effort.
I was brought up speaking the language; I understand and I can speak about everything with ease.
roles.language.categories.cefr.name: CEFR
roles.language.categories.cefr.descripti: Roles representing the user's language ability according to the CEFR.
roles.personalisation.name: Personalisation
roles.personalisation.description: Roles used to personalise one's server profile.
roles.personalisation.categories.orthogr: I am a proponent of Îdinism.
I am of the male persuasion.
I am of the female persuasion.
I am a native, or a child of natives, but I have been brought up abroad.
roles.learning.name: Learning
roles.learning.description: Roles applied in teaching and learning the language.
roles.learning.roles.classroomAttendee.d: I attend sessions in the classroom channel and would like to be notified when a session takes place.
roles.learning.roles.correctMe.name: Correct Me
roles.learning.roles.correctMe.descripti: "I think, therefore I make mistakes." - Please do correct me.
roles.learning.roles.doNotCorrectMe.name: Don't Correct Me
roles.learning.roles.doNotCorrectMe.desc: I learn through natural interaction and do not wish to be corrected.
roles.learning.roles.dailyPhrase.name: Daily Phrase
roles.learning.roles.dailyPhrase.descrip: I want to be notified when a new daily phrase is posted.
roles.learning.roles.voicechatter.name: Voicechatter
roles.learning.roles.voicechatter.descri: I enjoy attending (un)announced VC sessions and speaking with other people.
roles.ethnicity.name: Ethnicity
roles.regions.name: Regions
roles.regions.description: Roles specifying which area of the country one originates from.
